page.title: 07Caroline's Day!
page.content: Its Monday morning. 7.30 I'm up and ready! I go downstairs and have toast for{breakfast.}I get my things for school and my Mum takes my brother David and me up to school. It takes us 20 minutes to get there but we still have time to play before the bell at 9.00. Maths and Language work in the morning and playtime at 10.30.{ {Assembly}is at 10.45 and Zig Zag, a TV programme, is at 11.00. Lunch at 12. then out to play again. At 3.15 we go home, then I play with Helen, my best friend. We read or play indoors or watch TV. My favourite television programme is 'Top of the Pops'. I go to bed at 9 o'clock and sometimes I read a story to my brother. He is 7 and his favourite story is called 'The Clever Monkey'.
